# Angular Alfa vs Omega Strike Comparator

Angular project for comparing Alfa vs Omega Strike damage with interactive charts showing bonus damage comparison.

## Project Structure

- 3-tab interface using Angular Material
- Tab 1: Calculator with inputs (average damage, monster HP) + recommendation
- Tab 2: Bonus damage comparison chart (Alfa vs Omega)
- Tab 3: Bonus difference percentage chart

## Technologies

- Angular 17+
- Chart.js with ng2-charts
- Angular Material for tabs/UI
- TypeScript
